evidence.claim: Kurzweil Education offers tools that integrate with educational and health-related technology systems, but specific technical APIs are not mentioned on their on
No direct references to health-tech standards like HIPAA, X12, FHIR, or HL7 found on the company's main website or documentation pages.
The company mentions commitment to data privacy but lacks specific technical integrations listed on their security or engineering pages.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of involvement with X12 or healthcare data exchange.
